articles.title: LSE outage halts some trading; blue chips spared - Reuters UK
articles.description: The London Stock Exchange (LSE) (LSEG.L) said it is preparing to resume normal trading on Friday after an incident disrupted activity earlier on Thursday.
articles.content:
LONDON, Oct 19 (Reuters) - The London Stock Exchange (LSE) (LSEG.L) said it is preparing to resume normal trading on Friday after an incident disrupted activity earlier on Thursday.
